languages.text: "Ты не в первый раз вмешиваешься в деяния Несущих Слово. Коль скоро ты был{mf||а} на Райкаде Минорис, я хочу знать, в твоих ли руках то, что тебе не принадлежит. И ты сам{mf||а} расскажешь мне об этом". {n}Великан бросает через плечо пару слов на неизвестном вам языке — и вашу голову начинают сжимать невидимые тиски.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Столь трогательная непокорность силам, которые ты даже не в состоянии осмыслить... возможно, у тебя есть шанс против Дельфима".

languages.text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты не в первый раз вмешиваешься в деяния Несущих Слово. Коль скоро ты был{mf||а} на Райкаде Минорис, я хочу знать, в твоих ли руках то, что тебе не принадлежит. И ты сам{mf||а} расскажешь мне об этом". {n}Великан бросает через плечо пару слов на неизвестном вам языке — и вашу голову начинают сжимать невидимые тиски.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the servants of Chaos. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

languages.text: «No es la primera vez que te inmiscuyes en las acciones de los Portadores de la Palabra. Estuviste en Rykad Minoris, por lo que quiero ver si posees algo que no te pertenece. Y me lo dirás tú mism{mf|o|a}». {n}Pronuncia unas palabras en un idioma que no reconoces por encima del hombro y sientes cómo una presa invisible sujeta tu cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No es la primera vez que te inmiscuyes en las acciones de los sirvientes del Caos. Estuviste en Rykad Minoris, por lo que quiero ver si posees algo que no te pertenece. Y me lo dirás tú mism{mf|o|a}». {n}Pronuncia unas palabras en un idioma que no reconoces por encima del hombro y sientes cómo una presa invisible sujeta tu cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前がワードベアラーの行為に口を挟むのはこれが初めてではないな。お前はライカド・ミノリスにいた。よってお前が所有すべきでないものを持っているかどうかを聞きたい。自らの口で答えよ」{n}彼は肩越しに未知の言語でなんらかの言葉を発すると、見えない万力のようなもので頭を締め付けられる感覚を覚えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前がワードベアラーの行為に口を挟むのはこれが初めてではないな。お前はライカド・ミノリスにいた。よってお前が所有すべきでないものを持っているかどうかを聞きたい。自らの口で答えよ」{n}彼は肩越しに未知の言語でなんらかの言葉を発すると、見えない万力のようなもので頭を締め付けられる感覚を覚えた。{/n}

languages.text: “这已经不是你第一次插手怀言者的行动了。早在小莱卡德的时候，你就插手过一次。所以，我想知道，你手里是否拿着某个不属于你的东西？你自己来告诉我吧。”{n}他以某种不知名的语言说了几句话，随即，你感觉自己的头被看不见的虎钳紧紧钳住了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这已经不是你第一次插手混沌仆人的行动了，早在小莱卡德的时候，你就插手过一次。所以我想知道，你手里是否拿着某个不属于你的东西？你自己己来告诉我吧。”{n}他以某种不知名的语言说了几句话，随即，你感觉自己的头被看不见的虎钳紧紧钳住了。{/n}

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois que vous osez vous mêler des affaires des Word Bearers. Je sais que vous étiez sur Rykad Minoris, et maintenant, j'aimerais savoir si vous détenez quelque chose qui ne vous appartient pas. Et vous allez vous faire un plaisir de me l'avouer. » {n}Il prononce quelques mots dans une langue inconnue par-dessus son épaule, et votre crâne vous donne soudain l'impression d'être pris au piège d'un étau invisible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois que vous osez vous mêler des affaires des serviteurs du Chaos. Je sais que vous étiez sur Rykad Minoris, et maintenant j'aimerais savoir si vous détenez quelque chose qui ne vous appartient pas. Et vous allez vous faire un plaisir de me l'avouer. » {n}Il prononce quelques mots dans une langue inconnue par-dessus son épaule, et votre crâne vous donne soudain l'impression d'être pris au piège d'un étau invisible.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr mischt Euch nicht zum ersten Mal in die Angelegenheiten der Word Bearers ein. Ihr wart auf Rykad Minoris, daher möchte ich wissen, ob Ihr in Euren Händen haltet, was Euch zu halten nicht zusteht. Und Ihr werdet es mir selbst sagen." {n}Er bellt ein paar Worte in einer dir unbekannten Sprache über seine Schulter — und du spürst, wie dein Kopf von einer unsichtbaren Schraubzwinge umschlossen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mischt Euch nicht zum ersten Mal in die Angelegenheiten der Diener des Chaos ein. Ihr wart auf Rykad Minoris, daher möchte ich wissen, ob Ihr in Euren Händen haltet, was Euch zu halten nicht zusteht. Und Ihr werdet es mir selbst sagen." {n}Er bellt ein paar Worte in einer dir unbekannten Sprache über seine Schulter — und du spürst, wie dein Kopf von einer unsichtbaren Schraubzwinge umschlossen wird.{/n}

languages.text: "Vahyedenler'in işlerine ilk defa karışmıyorsun. Rykad Minoris'te de buna cüret etmiştin. Sana ait olmayan bir şeye sahipsen bilmek isterim. Bu isteğimi de kendi arzunla yerine getireceksin." {n}Bilinmeyen bir dilde birkaç kelime sarf ediyor, sonrasında başının görünmez bir mengeneyle sıkıştırıldığını hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This isn't your first time meddling in the deeds of the Word Bearers. You were there on Rykad Minoris, and so I want to know if you hold in your hands that which is not yours to hold. And you will tell me yourself." {n}He utters a few words in an unknown tongue over his shoulder — and you feel your head being clamped by an unseen vice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Vahyedenlerin işlerine ilk defa karışmıyorsun. Rykad Minoris’te de buna cüret etmiştin. Sana ait olmayan bir şeye sahipsen bilmek isterim. Bu isteğimi de kendi arzunla karşılayacaksın.” {n}Bilinmeyen bir dilde birkaç kelime sarf ettikten sonra başının görünmez bir mengeneyle sıkıştırıldığını hissediyorsun.{/n}
